attributes.action: reform the current tax credit system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: At present the tax credit system is letting down the very people it is meant to help. People are being left without money for months at a time and given no time scale for when they may recieve a payment. The system should be looked at and made user friendly with the low waged fast tracked to payment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
